amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the amount appropriated for the Economic Support Fund by $12,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 99 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to reduce the amount appropriated for the Economic Support Fund by $12,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A056) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 307 (Roll no. 469).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A056) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 307 (Roll no. 469).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A056) offered by Mr. Grothman.
